text: The South Bank is an area of London on the south bank of the River Thames. The South Bank is the home of the Royal Festival Hall, the Queen Elizabeth Hall, the Hayward Gallery, the BFI cinemas including the BFI IMAX and the National Theatre. The nearest tube and train station is Waterloo Station. ==Buildings== # London Eye # Royal Festival Hall == Other websites == * South Bank Centre Category:London Borough of Lambeth Category:London Borough of Southwark
title: South Bank
